items.sentence: I thought you knew Tom was allergic to peanuts.
That was one reason we decided to go to Boston.
Tom says he plans to be in Boston next weekend.
Tom says he wants to learn how to speak French.
Tom and Mary arrived in a horse-drawn carriage.
I\'m planning on staying at his place tomorrow.
I\'m worried about what\'ll happen if Tom wins.
We probably don\'t have enough time to do that.
We still need to buy food for tonight\'s party.
I\'d like to have Tom and Mary over for dinner.
